name: Website2App
author: Website2App

sections.description:
Convert Your WordPress Website Into a Native App

This new WordPress plugin is going to redefine everything you thought you knew about app development. Website2App is a WordPress plugin that converts your website into a native iPhone and Android application.
It’s completely free to install and configure. In the plugin settings you’ll see a preview of your app, once you’re happy with it you send it to the Website2App team to publish to the app stores.

Forget paying $50K+ and spending 6+ months on a development of an app for your business. Website2App has completely changed the game – you can get your app on the Google Play and App Store within a week for just $99/month.

With your new native app you’ll be able to send push notifications to your customers, opening a new marketing channel.

The beauty of having Website2App is that it works off of the same backend as your website meaning whenever you update your website you update your app instantly. Think of the time that is going to save you.
You’ve spent so much time making an impressive user experience for your customers on your website. Amplify your effort by using your website as your app foundations.
This has to be the best plugin for WordPress launched in 2022 that will serve your business for years to come.
sections.installation:
Getting started with Website2App consists of two steps:
1. Installing the Website2App Plugin
1. Configuring the Settings after installation

INSTALL Website2App FROM WITHIN WORDPRESS

  1. Visit the plugins page within your dashboard and select ‘Add New’;
  2. Search for ‘Website2App’;
  3. Activate Website2App from your Plugins page;
  4. Follow the Plugin Configuration Guide to customize your App.

INSTALL Website2App MANUALLY

  1. Upload the ‘website2app’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory;
  2. Activate the ‘Website2App” plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress;
  3. Follow the Plugin Configuration Guide to customize your App.
sections.faq:
How does the app get listed on the app store?

Website2App takes care of all the hard work for you! Just download our Website2App plugin, configure the settings to your preferences and submit.
Once our team receive the submission, we create the mobile app version of your website and submit to the Apple App Store for approval as well as any minor adjustments that may be required.

Do I need technical knowledge to configure the plugin?

Configuring the Website2App Plugin does not require high level technical skills.
If you have installed and configured any other WordPress plugin you should be ok, if you are concerned about the process, please watch our step-by-step configuration tutorials here.

How long does it take for the app to go live after it’s published?

Your app will be live on the App Store in less than 1 week.
If Apple denies your app, the Website2App team will consult with you and make some adjustments before re-submitting the app to the App Store, this will add another week to the process.

Can I have a custom menu structure for the app?

Yes you can! Custom navigation is a key feature of an app.
Your custom menu does need to point to an existing page on your website though.

Do all websites work with Website2App?

In short, yes, Website2App is compatible with all WordPress websites.
To ensure that your app has a great user experience it’s fundamental that it has a strong speed performance and responsive design.
To test your website please use our eligibility checker.

Does it cost as much as normal app development?

No no no, not at all!
The beauty of Website2App is that it’s super cheap to get started. Just a $399 payment to get published to the Google Play and App Stores and then $99/month on-going.
Compared to traditional app development, that can cost upwards of $50,000, Website2App is extremely cost effective.

Will the app look and feel different to my website?

Yes!
We’ve used our years of experience in app development to create features that make your app look & feel like a native app with minimal effort.
We’ve built a custom navigation feature that allows your to re-imagine your website’s user experience in app form.

Have more questions?

Watch our video tutorials that show you exactly how to configure our plugin for your website. The videos are lead by our lead designer, James, who will take you through every part of the configuration process.

short_description: A WordPress plugin that works like magic to turn your website into an iPhone and Android app.

upgrade_notice.1.0.1: Config file stored outside the plugin so that it does not get overwritten on plugin update/replace.
upgrade_notice.1.0.2: Added the feature to select the End of Journey Pages for Bottom Nav and Hamburger Menu Items. Added Select2 for multiple Select option for endFlow Page Selection
upgrade_notice.1.0.5: Suport Sticky Banner added so user can reachout if they need help configuring the plugin.
upgrade_notice.1.0.8: Bug Fix - Incorrect Page selected on Bottom Nav, Top Nav, Hamburger Menu and End of Flow Page sections, created custom function to show dropdown list of all pages instead of wp_dropdown_pages()

screenshots.caption: Bottom Navigation Settings: Set upto 5 Bottom Navigation Icons
Top Navigation Settings: Set Top Navigation style for each Landing Page
Authentication Settings: Select Page to Authenticate Users
Publish Settings: Submit your APP to Publish on App Store & Play Store
